comment.body: I agree that CF and Google fingerprint users for bot detection. Our system (as mentioned in https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/213039 ) cannot distinguish between these fingerprinting scripts used for bot detection and others for tracking, since they use the same fingerprinting techniques and browser APIs. Based on my search, these scripts seem to belong to TikTok/ByteDance. They can be used for bot detection through fingerprinting. I could not confirm the actual purpose since there is no official document introducing these scripts, unlike CF's `https://developers.cloudflare.com/cloudflare-challenges/challenge-types/javascript-detections/` and Google's `https://cloud.google.com/security/products/recaptcha`. I am open to closing this issue without blocking them, but to help with future submissions, is there any criteria you used to determine the actual use of fingerprinting scripts?

issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS. 


Previous issue https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/198973

issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS. 


Previous issue https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/198973

issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS. 


Previous issue https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/198973

issue.title: cloudfront.cafe24.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [http://cloudfront.cafe24.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fcloudfront.cafe24.com) ### Comment > # Request to Remove False-Positive Block for `optimizer.poxo.com` > > Hello AdGuard Team, > > We serve static assets—JS, CSS, and fonts—via Amazon S3 and CloudFront on the custom domain **`optimizer.poxo.com`**. > It appears AdGuard has classified this domain as an advertising domain, which is causing style breakage and related issues for customers using AdGuard. > > Please review this classification and **promptly remove the block (reclassify)** for **`optimizer.poxo.com`**. This domain is used solely for delivering site assets and does not serve advertising content. > > --- > > ## Affected Site > > - **`cloudfront.cafe24.com`** > > When `optimizer.poxo.com` is blocked, pages on the above site may fail to load CSS and render unstyled. > > --- > > ## Examples > > - **CSS via our CloudFront-backed asset domain** > https://optimizer.poxo.com/css/common/75ff3f6c7d8892d902f935f4c1e3a34ed3f39fe0/1757375448 > > - **CSS via the site’s domain** > https://cloudfront.cafe24.com/ind-script/optimizer.php?filename=nZJBbgIxDEX3o2x7DtOKXgAkDlDEAZyMgWgcO3ISCW7PtJsyCxBk-_Xf_9-S4ayJ4PPLIJueDBMYFW0WCEIpcDSVCkFTUnGz8AGv-CkMRbnVqDJ4vXSCrdbeUsYrWR9a0TN1opoHjkKDR5GH_Rw9HGLGMMHPfd4WmWREg7X7dis4MtYcw_QoBnOG_VnzMmT3N2rjC3U168QbbFwHOfRKcqTxo2ijcvKWXb-V3aeNUy9sFFWq-_R_395Aw&type=css&k=f4b53a7bab4e81b4516ab3da08e7f7409e4d8dde&t=1757375448 > > --- > > ## Impact > > - Blocking CSS and other static assets leads to: > - Pages rendering without styles (unstyled) > - Degraded user experience for customers using AdGuard > > --- > > ## How to Reproduce > > 1. Enable AdGuard. > 2. Visit **`cloudfront.cafe24.com`**. > 3. Observe that requests to **`optimizer.poxo.com`** are blocked and styles fail to load. > > --- > > ## Request > > - Please **remove the block** and/or **reclassify** **`optimizer.poxo.com`** so it is not treated as an advertising domain. > - If additional verification is needed, we can promptly provide logs or further details. > > --- ``` Username: @cafe24-ykoh ``` ### Screenshots

issue.title: jlcpcb.com login page does not load
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [x] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

AdGuard URL Tracking filter 2.0.11.81

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://passport.jlcpcb.com/#/login?from=

### Ad Blocking

EasyList

### Privacy

AdGuard URL Tracking filter

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

_No response_

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

Got to jlcpcb.com, press sign in, it redirects to https://passport.jlcpcb.com/#/login?from= but the `from` parameter is removed by the AdGuard URL Tracking filter and the page does not load.

If I disable the filter list, then this works:
https://passport.jlcpcb.com/#/login?from=

And this doesn't:
https://passport.jlcpcb.com/#/login


### Privacy

- [x] I agree to follow this condition

This domain is used solely for delivering site assets and does not serve advertising content. > > --- > > ## Affected Site > > - **`cloudfront.cafe24.com`** > > When `optimizer.poxo.com` is blocked, pages on the above site may fail to load CSS and render unstyled. > > --- > > ## Examples > > - **CSS via our CloudFront-backed asset domain** > https://optimizer.poxo.com/css/common/75ff3f6c7d8892d902f935f4c1e3a34ed3f39fe0/1757375448 > > - **CSS via the site’s domain** > https://cloudfront.cafe24.com/ind-script/optimizer.php?filename=nZJBbgIxDEX3o2x7DtOKXgAkDlDEAZyMgWgcO3ISCW7PtJsyCxBk-_Xf_9-S4ayJ4PPLIJueDBMYFW0WCEIpcDSVCkFTUnGz8AGv-CkMRbnVqDJ4vXSCrdbeUsYrWR9a0TN1opoHjkKDR5GH_Rw9HGLGMMHPfd4WmWREg7X7dis4MtYcw_QoBnOG_VnzMmT3N2rjC3U168QbbFwHOfRKcqTxo2ijcvKWXb-V3aeNUy9sFFWq-_R_395Aw&type=css&k=f4b53a7bab4e81b4516ab3da08e7f7409e4d8dde&t=1757375448 > > --- > > ## Impact > > - Blocking CSS and other static assets leads to: > - Pages rendering without styles (unstyled) > - Degraded user experience for customers using AdGuard > > --- > > ## How to Reproduce > > 1. Enable AdGuard. > 2. Visit **`cloudfront.cafe24.com`**. > 3. Observe that requests to **`optimizer.poxo.com`** are blocked and styles fail to load. > > --- > > ## Request > > - Please **remove the block** and/or **reclassify** **`optimizer.poxo.com`** so it is not treated as an advertising domain. > - If additional verification is needed, we can promptly provide logs or further details. > > --- ``` Username: @cafe24-ykoh ``` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adtidy.org/sitereports/d3qf962wwmgo4ko48kgkosk0g8ckgs4ekhydapu408.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adtidy.org/sitereports/jmiog5s1vrk8wgk844wskosgc4ks8s47l16y04lbj8.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adtidy.org/sitereports/bx6h56s1x9ckgc88c88sk0wok0go08woygoy1m0idc.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for iOS v4.5.12 System version: | `IOS 26.0` License type: | paid Advanced protection: | enabled DNS filtering: | server: `adguard-dns.io`
filters: `optimizer.poxo.com`, `` Filters: | Ad blocking:
AdGuard Base

Other:
AdGuard DNS Custom filters: | `optimizer.poxo.com` Other extensions used: | `adguard`

comment.body:
The link in the original report appears to be broken. 
Please use the corrected URL below (CSS served via the site domain), which reproduces the issue when `optimizer.poxo.com` is blocked:

https://cloudfront.cafe24.com/ind-script/optimizer.php?filename=nZJBbgIxDEX3o2x7DtOKXgAkDlDEAZyMgWgcO3ISCW7PtJsyCxBk-_Xf_9-S4ayJ4PPLIJueDBMYFW0WCEIpcDSVCkFTUnGz8AGv-CkMRbnVqDJ4vXSCrdbeUsYrWR9a0TN1opoHjkKDR5GH_Rw9HGLGMMHPfd4WmWREg7X7dis4MtYcw_QoBnOG_VnzMmT3N2r2jC3U168QbbFwHOfRKcqTxo2ijcvKWXb-V3aeNUy9sFFWq-_R_395Aw&type=css&k=f4b53a7bab4e81b4516ab3da08e7f7409e4d8dde&t=1757375448

Thanks for taking another look.

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking)
 [https://goo.gl/app/maps/mhYZrKSKWr1gWgc98?g_st=atm&_nr=1](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fgoo.gl%2Fapp%2Fmaps%2FmhYZrKSKWr1gWgc98%3Fg_st%3Datm%26_nr%3D1)
### Comment
> Hi support team,
> 
> Thank you for your great service. I'm using it to protect my privacy and reduce the number of ads on my devices, and it works very well, except for one problem with Google Maps on my Android and iOS devices. If I share my Google Maps bookmarks via a link or if I receive a link shared with me from Google Maps, when I click on it, the DNS request to Google seems to be blocked by AdGuard, and I cannot open any link until I turn it off, which is really inconvenient. Could you please fix the Google-related Maps services to prevent them from being blocked? Otherwise, the functionality of Google Maps when using AdGuard is incomplete.
> 
> In the attachment, you will find a video where I reproduce the bug:
> https://drive.proton.me/urls/BDJYXHAMHC#YMg0XbWpJdzY
> 
> Best wishes,
> Bogdan
```
Username: @b09dan 
```

issue.title: bancodevenezuela.com

labels.name: A: Bug
labels.description: The issue is caused by a program bug

issue.body:
### Prerequisites - [x] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material; - [x] The problem occurs only when using AdGuard DNS or DNS filtering with AdGuard DNS filter, it is not caused by other ad blockers; - [x] You're using an up-to-date version of AdGuard DNS filter; - [x] Browser version is up-to-date; - [x] If a website or an app is broken, disabling AdGuard DNS filter resolves the issue. ### What DNS server do you use? AdGuard private DNS ### Version _No response_ ### What DNS upstream(s) do you use in AdGuard apps or AdGuard Home? tls://dns.adguard-dns.com ### What DNS filters do you have enabled? AdGuard DNS filter ### What browser or app do you use? Firefox ### Which device type do you use? Desktop ### What type of problem have you encountered? Missed analytics or tracker ### Where did you encounter the problem? www.bancodevenezuela.com banvenez.com.ve play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.bancodevenezuela.bdvdigital apps.apple.com/us/app/bdvapp/id1629896484 ### Add your comment and screenshots These sites and apps send telemetry to "bdvmetricas.banvenez.com.ve". It's a bank, so I've been using and testing thoroughly all the functions one by one over 2 weeks now and I've found no issue whatsoever both on mobile and desktop. It clearly sends nothing essential.
### Privacy - [x] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body: Thanks, added.

### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.cuelinks.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.cuelinks.com) ### Comment > When AdGuard is enabled, we are unable to use Cuelinks (www.cuelinks.com) as well as our Letsearn app. Both depend on our domain and API for link generation and tracking, but the blocking prevents users from accessing our platforms and accessing key features. > > Cuelinks is a trusted affiliate marketing platform, and all redirects and API calls are safe and only connect to verified merchant websites. We kindly request you to review and whitelist our domain so that Cuelinks and Letsearn work without disruption. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adtidy.org/sitereports/8ocoe9mn56gwgsgwswwkcswkc4wss0gde4fypc3l4g.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adtidy.org/sitereports/njj6r7i7eo000ko48cs8cssgc88sc0c55hlv8pg8hw.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Android v1.1.0 System version: | `Android 13` Browser: | Chrome License type: | free AdGuard mode: | VPN HTTPS filtering: | enabled Tracking protection: | disabled DNS filtering: | server: `dns.adguard.com`
Filters: | Ad blocking:
AdGuard Base Custom filters: | `dns.adguard.com` Browsing Security: | disabled Browsing Security statistics: | disabled Userscripts: | disabled

Fixed in https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/commit/d7e0ca04dd41438b0d52d056e71875e4a969d6e2
Unfortunately, the MV3 extension cannot update filters (due to Google policy), so new rules will be available in one of the next extension version.
